subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James, sniffling and wheezing through a head cold, helped the Cavaliers extend their home winning streak to 20 by beating the New Orleans Hornets, 92-78.
snippet: LeBron James, sniffling and wheezing through a head cold, helped the Cavaliers extend their home winning streak to 20 by beating the New Orleans Hornets, 92-78.
